feature.label: ECF XMPP Provider
feature.description: This feature installs the XMPP/XMPPS/Google Talk provider. The XMPP provider implements the Presence API for presence and instant messaging, the Datashare API for channel-based asynchronous messaging, the Remote Service API for providing Remote Services via XMPP/XMPPS/Google Talk services, and the Shared Object API. For tutorials, examples, and documentation about OSGi Remote Services see https://wiki.eclipse.org/ECF#OSGi_Remote_Services
